vulnerabilities.title: OneUptime Vulnerable to a Privilege Escalation via Local Storage Key Manipulation
vulnerabilities.description:
## Summary
A security vulnerability exists in oneuptime's local storage handling, where a regular user can escalate privileges by modifying the `is_master_admin` key to `true`. This allows unauthorized access to administrative functionalities.

## Details
The vulnerability lies in the improper validation of client-side stored data within the web application. Specifically, the `is_master_admin` key, stored in the local storage of the browser, can be manipulated by an attacker. By changing this ke
